name: Overrolled Attributes
description:
Overrolled Attributes is a fast paced first person shooter.
In this game, you must evade enemies and make your way to the dnd dice at the end of each level.
But there is a catch!
The theme is "roll of the dice" meaning there is some randomness in bound.
You will get at each level one random power and one random weakness.
You will have to make do with the weakness and powers that you have and use them to get to the dice.
Controls: WASD to move, E to use power, left shift to run, left mouse to shoot, R to reload, right mouse to aim

Discord: Taccos#1054
